description: aseprite: Animated sprite editor & pixel art tool

64bit.pre_install: Import-Module "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\Common7\Tools\Microsoft.VisualStudio.DevShell.dll"; Enter-VsDevShell 87b72232 -SkipAutomaticLocation -DevCmdArguments "-arch=x64 -host_arch=x64"; cd $dir && mkdir build && mkdir build/skia && cp ~\scoop\apps\libskia-aseprite\current\* build\skia\ -Recurse && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo -DLAF_BACKEND=skia -DSKIA_DIR="$($dir)\build\skia" -DSKIA_LIBRARY_DIR="$($dir)\build\skia\out\Release-x64" -DSKIA_LIBRARY="$($dir)\build\skia\out\Release-x64\skia.lib" -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=cl -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=cl -DCMAKE_IGNORE_PATH=C:\MinGW\bin -DCMAKE_IGNORE_PATH="$($scoopdir)\apps\mingw\*\bin" -DCMAKE_IGNORE_PATH="$($scoopdir)\apps\gcc\*\bin" -G Ninja .. && ninja aseprite
